mainText.attr1: Busy fighting? Lost one of your cruisers? Did this ever happen to you?
Well it happened to me a lot. So I added the ability to - watch objects.
Works in Tactical Mode and Ship Mode.
Click on the little - tab dealie/button - as shown in image on right.
Can - overwrite - another watched object with another.
Clicked on the watched object - the name portion - to quickly select object.
Periodically look at watched object - to watch it.
